required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on December 16, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study of Application of Pulse Electrical Stimulation Around Eye in Glaucoma Patients
clinical_study.official_title: A Single Center, Open-label, Exploratory Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of the Application of Pulse Electrical Stimulation Around the Eye in Glaucoma Patients

brief_summary.textblock: This study aims to evaluate the efficacy and safety of applying pulse electrical stimulation around eyes of glaucoma patients.

detailed_description.textblock: Duration of study period(per participant): Screening period(0-4weeks), Intervention period(16weeks) Patient needs to visit site at least 5 times(Screening, V2, V3, V4, V5). V2 can be done with screening visit. Visit 3, 4, 5 is 2weeks, 6weeks, and 16weeks after visit 2(Baseline).

primary_outcome.description: Check the change of intraocular pressure in the baseline, 2, 6, 12, 16 weeks
Check the change of visual acuity in the baseline, 2, 6, 12, 16 weeks
Check the change of mean deviation(MD) in the baseline, 2, 6, 12, 16 weeks
Check the change of pattern standard deviation(PSD) in the baseline, 2, 6, 12, 16 weeks
Check the change of visual field index(VFI) in the baseline, 2, 6, 12, 16 weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in parapapillary retinal nerve fiber layer thickness (RNFLT) using optical coherence tomography(OCT)
secondary_outcome.description: Check the change of parapapillary retinal nerve fiber layer thickness(RNFLT) in the baseline, 6, 16 weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in Laminar cribrosa (LC) depth using optical coherence tomography(OCT)
secondary_outcome.description: Check the change of Laminar cribrosa(LC) depth in the baseline, 6, 16 weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in macular ganglion cell-inner plexiform layer thickness (GCIPLT) using optical coherence tomography(OCT)
secondary_outcome.description: Check the change of macular ganglion cell-inner plexiform layer thickness(GCIPLT) in the baseline, 6, 16 weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in circumpapillary vessel density (cpVD) using Optical coherence tomography angiography(OCT-A)
secondary_outcome.description: Check the change of circumpapillary vessel density(cpVD) in the baseline, 6, 16 weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in macular vessel density (mVD) using Optical coherence tomography angiography(OCT-A)
secondary_outcome.description: Check the change of macular vessel density(mVD) in the baseline, 6, 16 weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in N95 amplitude using pattern Electroretinogram(ERG)
secondary_outcome.description: Check the change of N95 amplitude in the baseline, 6, 16 weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in latency using pattern Electroretinogram(ERG)
secondary_outcome.description: Check the change of latency in the baseline, 6, 16 weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in Glaucoma Quality of Life-15 (GQL-15)
secondary_outcome.description: Check the change of Glaucoma Quality of Life-15(GQL-15) score in the baseline, 6, 16 weeks

arm_group.description: Duration of study period(per participant): Screening period(0-4weeks), Intervention period(16weeks) Patient needs to visit site at least 5 times(Screening, V2, V3, V4, V5). V2 can be done with screening visit. Visit 3, 4, 5 is 2weeks, 6weeks, and 16weeks after visit 2(Baseline).

intervention.description: Pulse Electrical Stimulation Patients wear our clinical trial device 30mins once a day for 16weeks.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Participants must be 19 to 75 years of age, at the time of screening
- Patients with normal tension glaucoma or open angle glaucoma
- Patients with best-corrected visual acuity of 20/40 or more
- Patients whose Mean Deviation(MD) value of visual field test is -6dB or less
- Patients who have stable eye pressure of less than 20mmHg over the past 2 months
- If glaucoma treatment is in progress, the type, dose, and form of drug for treatment are stable for more than 2 months
Exclusion Criteria:
- A person who has no pregnancy plan during the clinical trial period and has agreed to an effective contraceptive plan for Women of child bearing potential(WOCBP)
- Women of non-child bearing potential(WONCBP) must meet at least one of the following criteria:
1. Postmenopausal women who are at least 45 years old and had no menses for 24 consecutive months
2. A woman who underwent hysterectomy of bilateral ovarian resection recorded by a doctor
- All other female patients will be considered WOCBP.
- A person who voluntarily agreed to participate in this clinical trial

facility.name: Department of Ophthalmology, Konkuk University Medical Center

contact.last_name: Youn Hye Jo, Ph. D., MD.

investigator.last_name: Youn Hye Jo, Ph. D., MD.
